50 stitches next round k2 k2tog yo *k4 k2tog yo* repeat between *s end k2 knit 2 rounds bind off loosely until you have one stitch left do not cut yarn with your crochet hook ch1 single_crochet in same space *slip_stitch in next st ch3 slip_stitch in first chain single_crochet in next stitch * repeat around joining with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends make a cord about 30 long i-cord monk s cord braid - whatever you prefer the tie on the original bag is monk s cord and thread through the eyelets knotting the ends so the cord stays put bag - the 2nd make a loop of yarn - no slip knot - and work 8 single_crochet into the loop pull the end gently to draw the stitches into a circle alternatively ch2 and work 7 single_crochet into first chain join with slip_stitch in last chain round 1 chain 2 half_double_crochet into same space work 2 half_double_crochet into each stitch around join in starting chain 16 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch *work 1 half_double_crochet in next stitch and 2 hdcs in following stitch* repeat between *s around join in starting chain 24 half_double_crochet round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch work 2 hdcs in following stitch *work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next two stitches and 2 hdcs in following stitch* repeat between *s around join in starting chain 32 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 stitches work 2 half_double_crochet in following stitch *work 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 stitches and 2 half_double_crochet in following stitch * repeat between *s around join in starting chain 40 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in following stitch *work half_double_crochet in each of next 4 stitches and 2 half_double_crochet in following stitch * repeat between *s around join in starting chain 48 half_double_crochet round 6 chain 2 work one more round of hdcs increasing 3 stitches evenly - do not join 51 half_double_crochet working into the strand just below the back loop of the stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch around and continue spiraling up that is just keep crocheting hdcs in the next stitch without joining for about 2 5 -
